mapper.select:
SELECT VOUCHER_NO, GRADE, TICKET_NAME, FORMAT(PRICE , 0) PRICE, FORMAT(SALE_PRICE , 0) SALE_PRICE, USE_TIME, END_DATE, REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DATE, UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') UPD_DATE, IMAGE_IDX, (SELECT STORE_NAME FROM STORE WHERE STORE.STORE_ID = VOUCHER.STORE_ID) STORE_NAME FROM VOUCHER
AND STATUS != '05'
AND GRADE = 'VIP_REGIST'
AND GRADE IN ('VIP_ANON', 'NORMAL')

SELECT A.VOUCHER_NO, A.GRADE, A.TICKET_NAME, A.PRICE, A.SALE_PRICE, CASE WHEN A.USE_TIME = 'UNLIMITED' THEN '0' ELSE A.USE_TIME END AS USE_TIME, CASE WHEN A.END_DATE > '28000000' THEN '0' ELSE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y%m%d'), A.END_DATE) END AS END_DATE, A.REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DATE, A.UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') UPD_DATE, A.IMAGE_IDX, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(B.ATTRIBUTE SEPARATOR ',') FROM VOUCHER_ATTRIBUTE B WHERE A.VOUCHER_NO = B.VOUCHER_NO) ATTRIBUTE FROM VOUCHER A WHERE VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo}

SELECT A.VOUCHER_NO, A.GRADE, A.TICKET_NAME, FORMAT(A.PRICE , 0) PRICE, FORMAT(A.SALE_PRICE , 0) SALE_PRICE, A.USE_TIME, CONCAT(A.END_DATE,'개월') END_DATE, A.REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DATE, A.UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') UPD_DATE, A.IMAGE_IDX, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(B.ATTRIBUTE SEPARATOR ',') FROM VOUCHER_ATTRIBUTE B WHERE A.VOUCHER_NO = B.VOUCHER_NO) ATTRIBUTE FROM VOUCHER A
AND STATUS = '02'
AND A.GRADE = 'VIP_REGIST'
AND A.GRADE IN ('VIP_ANON', 'NORMAL')
SELECT VOUCHER_NO, ATTRIBUTE, REG_ID, REG_DATE FROM VOUCHER_ATTRIBUTE WHERE VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo}
SELECT A.VOUCHER_NO, A.TIME_LEFT_HOUR, A.TIME_LEFT_MINUTE, B.TICKET_NAME FROM VOUCHER_USE_VIEW A, VOUCHER B WHERE VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo} AND VOUCHER_NO = B.VOUCHER_NO

SELECT A.VOUCHER_NO, A.TICKET_NAME, A.GRADE, A.PRICE, A.USE_TIME, D.NAME, C.TIME_LEFT_HOUR FROM VOUCHER A, VOUCHER_SALE B, VOUCHER_USE_VIEW C, MEMBER_CHILDREN D WHERE A.VOUCHER_NO = B.VOUCHER_NO AND B.VOUCHER_NO = C.VOUCHER_NO AND B.BUY_CELL_PHONE = #{buyCellPhone} AND A.STATUS = '12' AND (C.TIME_LEFT_HOUR = 'UNLIMITED' OR C.TIME_LEFT_HOUR > 0) AND B.BUY_CELL_PHONE = D.PARENT_CELL_PHONE

SELECT A.VOUCHER_NO, A.TICKET_NAME, A.GRADE, A.PRICE, A.USE_TIME, C.TIME_LEFT_HOUR, C.TIME_LEFT_MINUTE, D.NAME CHILD_NAME, E.NAME FROM VOUCHER A, VOUCHER_SALE B, VOUCHER_USE_VIEW C, MEMBER_CHILDREN D, MEMBER_PARENT E WHERE A.VOUCHER_NO = B.VOUCHER_NO AND B.VOUCHER_NO = C.VOUCHER_NO AND B.BUY_CELL_PHONE = #{cellPhone} AND B.BUY_CELL_PHONE = D.PARENT_CELL_PHONE AND D.PARENT_CELL_PHONE = E.CELL_PHONE

SELECT R.RESERVATION_ID, A.VOUCHER_NO, C.VOUCHER_USE_ID, D.CELL_PHONE, C.REG_DATE, (SELECT S.STORE_NAME FROM STORE S WHERE S.STORE_ID = F.STORE_ID) STORE_NAME, E.NAME CHILD_NAME, A.TICKET_NAME, G.NAME PLAY_NAME, CASE WHEN R.TUTORING_YN = 'N' THEN CASE WHEN (C.USE_TIME % 60) != 0 THEN ROUND(C.USE_TIME / 60,1) ELSE FORMAT((C.USE_TIME / 60),0) END ELSE '' END AS USE_TIME, CASE WHEN R.TUTORING_YN = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN (C.USE_TIME % 60) != 0 THEN ROUND(C.USE_TIME / 60,1) ELSE FORMAT((C.USE_TIME / 60),0) END ELSE '' END AS USE_TUTORING_TIME, R.STATUS FROM VOUCHER A, VOUCHER_SALE B, VOUCHER_USE C, MEMBER_PARENT D, MEMBER_CHILDREN E, RESERVATION R, SCHEDULE F LEFT JOIN PLAY G ON F.PLAY_ID = G.PLAY_ID WHERE D.CELL_PHONE = #{cellPhone} AND A.VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo} AND A.VOUCHER_NO = B.VOUCHER_NO AND B.VOUCHER_NO = C.VOUCHER_NO AND B.BUY_CELL_PHONE = D.CELL_PHONE AND D.CELL_PHONE = E.PARENT_CELL_PHONE AND C.SCHEDULE_ID = F.SCHEDULE_ID AND R.SCHEDULE_ID = C.SCHEDULE_ID AND R.VOUCHER_NO = A.VOUCHER_NO GROUP BY R.RESERVATION_ID, A.VOUCHER_NO, C.VOUCHER_USE_ID, D.CELL_PHONE, C.REG_DATE, F.STORE_ID, E.NAME, A.TICKET_NAME, G.NAME, R.TUTORING_YN, R.STATUS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOUCHER ( VOUCHER_NO, GRADE, TICKET_NAME, PRICE, SALE_PRICE, USE_TIME, END_DATE, REG_ID, REG_DATE, IMAGE_IDX, STATUS, STORE_ID ) VALUES ( #{voucherNo}, #{grade}, #{ticketName}, #{price}, #{salePrice}, #{useTime}, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL #{endDate} MONTH), '%Y%m%d'), #{regId}, NOW(), #{imageIdx}, #{status}, #{storeId} )
INSERT INTO VOUCHER_ATTRIBUTE( VOUCHER_NO, ATTRIBUTE, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{voucherNo}, #{attribute}, #{regId}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO VOUCHER_SALE( VOUCHER_NO, BUY_CELL_PHONE, USED_CHILDREN_NAME, PG_TYPE, APPROVAL_NO, STORE_ID, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{voucherNo}, #{buyCellPhone}, #{usedChildrenName}, #{pgType}, #{approvalNo}, #{storeId}, #{regId}, NOW() )
